name: BeadSounds
0:
”Alexa open Bead Sounds”
”Alexa ask Bead Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bead sounds
des:
Bead Sounds simulates the sounds of beads being moved and clicked together. It creates a calming and meditative environment, mimicking the act of counting beads or creating beadwork.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Bead Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
